.. _`Troubleshooting`:

Troubleshooting
===============
This section describes some common issues that can arise and possible solutions.

Issue #1
--------
Virtual environment not configured

.. code-block:: powershell
    
    $ cd cmpt221ingoglia/
    $ python3 -m venv .venv
    $ .venv/Scripts/activate

Issue #2
--------
Unable to connect to database
    * Check ``.env`` file
    * Ensure values in ``.env`` file match ``postgres db``

Example:

.. code-block:: text
    
    db_name = postgres_table_name
    db_owner = postgres
    db_pass = postgres_table_password

Issue #3
--------
Docker not working
    
1. Install Docker Desktop from `the official site <https://www.docker.com/products/docker-desktop>`_
2. Refer to Docker Desktop `documentation <https://docs.docker.com>`_ for configuration
